#summary The document.prefix property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `document.prefix` property returns the namespace prefix of a node.

== Usage ==
  * only works in documents that have an XML mime type
  * implements Node.prefix, introduced in Dom Level 2
  * requires a namespace aware parser
